---
category: news
title: "Snowflake Achieves U.S. Department of Defense Impact Level 4 Authorization on AWS GovCloud"
excerpt: "Snowflake (NYSE: SNOW), the Data Cloud company, has received Provisional Authorization (PA) by the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) at the U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) to operate at Impact Level 4 (IL4) on the AWS GovCloud (US-West) Region from Amazon Web Services (AWS)."
